front.title: Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) algorithms for GOST 28147-89, GOST R 34.10-94, GOST R 34.10-2001, GOST R 34.11-94.

abstract.t: This document describes the conventions for using cryptographicalgorithms GOST 28147-89, GOST R 34.10-94, GOST R 34.10-2001, GOST R34.11-94, along with Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS). The CMS isused for digital signature, digest, authentication and encryptionarbitrary message contents.
